entry.title: Tuesday night: Clear. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Clear. Fog patches developing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the morning. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming west 20 km/h near noon. High minus 12. Wind chill near minus 24. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 17.
